title: Multimedia Content
description: Learn exactly how to create high-quality videos, podcasts, interactive content and more.
content: OverviewThere’s no doubt about it: multimedia content is on the rise. According to MusicOomph.com, over 79 million Americans listen to at least one podcast every week. And YouTube has surpassed Facebook as the 2nd most popular website on the planet. And if you’re used to writing blog posts, the shift to a new medium can seem daunting at first. You need to learn about microphones, cameras, episodes, editing… not to mention completely new platforms. In this section you’ll learn how to crank out high-quality multimedia content like a boss, including tips for video content, podcasting and visual content. This page contains a library of resources to help you create highly effective video, audio and visual content.Video ContentAn overview of video content and how it fits into the content marketing landscape. Explore this ResourcePodcastingA short and sweet guide to starting a podcast from scratch. Explore this ResourceVisual ContentA complete guide to visual content marketing. Includes 17 types of visual content that you can try today. Explore this ResourceInteractive ContentThis guide will show you how to use interactive content as part of your content marketing strategy. Explore this Resource
